name: Arrested
definition: Seize (someone) by legal authority and take into custody.

name: Car Chase
definition: Vehicular hot pursuit of suspects by law enforcers.

name: Crying
definition: Shedding of tears (or welling of tears in the eyes) in response to an emotional state.

name: Detained
definition: To hold or keep in or as if in custody

name: Fight
definition: Take part in a violent struggle involving the exchange of physical blows or the use of weapons.

name: Foot Chase
definition: Pursue on foot in order to catch or catch up with.

name: Handcuffed
definition: Put handcuffs on (someone).

name: Handshake
definition: An act of shaking a person's hand with one's own.

name: Hogtied
definition: Secure by fastening together the hands and feet (of a person) or all four feet (of an animal)

name: K9 Used
definition: A dog trained to aid the police, as in tracking criminals or detecting controlled substances.

name: Cop Take Down
definition: An act of bringing one's opponent to the ground

name: Rights Read
definition: Miranda rights, is a right to silence warning given by police in the United States to criminal suspects in police custody (or in a custodial interrogation) before they are interrogated to preserve the admissibility of their statements against them in criminal proceedings.
example: You have the right to remain silent and refuse to answer questions; Anything you say may be used against you in a court of law; You have the right to consult an attorney before speaking to the police and to have an attorney present during questioning now or in the future.; If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be appointed for you before any questioning if you wish.; If you decide to answer questions now without an attorney present, you will still have the right to stop answering at any time until you talk to an attorney.; Knowing and understanding your rights as I have explained them to you, are you willing to answer my questions without an attorney present?

name: Search
definition: Try to find something by looking or otherwise seeking carefully and thoroughly.

name: Traffic Stop
definition: Being pulled over, is a temporary detention of a driver of a vehicle by police to investigate a possible crime or minor violation of law.

name: Warning
definition: A warning issued by the officer is a statement that the motorist has committed some offense, but is being spared the actual citation.

name: Beer Can
definition: An aluminium can for beer.

name: Drunk Walking
definition: Walking around under heavy influence of alcohol

name: DUI Test
definition: Standardized Field Sobriety Test (SFST) is a battery of 3 tests performed during a traffic stop in order to determine if a driver is impaired. The 3 tests that make up the SFST are the horizontal gaze nystagmus (HGN), the walk-and-turn, and the one-leg stand tests.

name: Alcohol
definition: Any fermented liquor, such as wine, beer, or distilled spirit, that contains ethyl alcohol, or ethanol

name: Open Container
definition: Refers to having any opened alcoholic beverage in an openly public places such as sidewalks, parks and vehicles.

name: Underage Drinking
definition: The consumption of alcohol under a legally specified age, usually before one's 21st birthday.

name: Cocaine
definition: An addictive drug derived from coca or prepared synthetically, used as an illegal stimulant and sometimes medicinally as a local anesthetic.

name: Drug Paraphernalia
definition: Any equipment, product, accessory, or material that is modified for making, using, or concealing drugs, typically for recreational purposes

name: Meth
definition: The drug methamphetamine.

name: Meth Pipe
definition: A hollow glass bulb, with an extruding shaft, used for vaporizing methamphetamine or crystal meth, in order to inhale the vapor for its stimulating properties

name: Needle
definition: An instrument (as for the injection of medicine or the withdrawal of bodily fluids) that consists of a hollow barrel fitted with a plunger and a hollow needle

name: PCP
definition: Slang for the drug phencyclidine. Also known as angeldust. Probably the scariest of all drugs. Was used as a horse tranquilizer. Makes the user hallucinate, become extremely violent, and not feel anything. People have been known to do horrible things to themselves while under the influence of PCP.

name: Pills
definition: Small round mass of solid medicine to be swallowed whole.

name: Spoon
definition: Spoons, bottle caps, or other containers used to dissolve drugs

name: Weed Found
definition: Cannabis also known as marijuana among several other names, found in vehicle or on a person or in belongings.

name: Weed Pipe
definition: Pipe or any other instrument in which the marijuana is placed (packed) to be smoked.

name: Bodily Fluids
definition: Liquids originating from inside the bodies of living people.
example: Blood, Feces, Breast Milk, Semen, Saliva, Urine, Vomit, etc.

name: Knife
definition: An instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon.

name: Sex Toy
definition: An object or device used for sexual stimulation or to enhance sexual pleasure.

name: Assault Rifle
definition: A selective-fire rifle that uses an intermediate cartridge and a detachable magazine.

name: Handgun
definition: A gun designed for use by one hand, especially a pistol or revolver.

name: Gun Found
definition: A handgun, rifle, or shotgun found in vehicle or on a person or in belongings.

name: Shotgun
definition: A smooth bore gun for firing small shot at short range.

name: Shots Fired
definition: A handgun, rifle, or shotgun discharged.

name: Taser
definition: Conducted electrical weapon (CEW) is an electroshock weapon that fires two small dart-like electrodes, which stay connected to the main unit by conductors, to deliver electric current to disrupt voluntary control of muscles causing 'neuromuscular incapacitation'.

quotes.quote: 'Police! Stop right there. You're gonna get tased. You're gonna get tased'
quotes.author: Trooper Todd Poole

name: Car Seat
definition: A portable seat for an infant or a small child that attaches to an automobile seat and holds the child safely.

name: Broken Taillight
definition: A non-functioning red light at the rear of a motor vehicle, motorcycle, or bicycle.

name: Broken Headlight
definition: A non-functioning light at the front of a motor vehicle or motorcycle.

name: Domestic Disturbance
definition: A dispute requiring police response that involves two or more people engaged in an intimate relationship (married or divorced couples, live-in lovers, people on a first date, problems between adults and children, or adults and elderly parents).

name: Expired Licence
definition: Out of date Driver's License.

name: Expired Tags
definition: Out of date tags/stickers on vehicle tag/licence plate.

name: Felony Warrant
definition: The courts can issue a warrant authorizing the police to arrest and charge the suspect with a felony crime.

name: Hooker
definition: Slang term for a prostitute or someone who exchanges sex for money.

name: No ID
definition: Is not in possession of a Driver's Licence or a legal form of identification

name: Lights Off
definition: Operating a vehicle on a public highway during the period from one-half hour after sunset to one-half hour before sunrise or at any other time when windshield wipers are in use, as a result of rain, sleet, snow, hail or other unfavorable atmospheric condition, and at such other times as visibility for a distance of one thousand feet ahead of such motor vehicle is not clear, lighted head lamps turned on.

name: No Seat Belt
definition: Operating a vehicle on a public highway without waring three-point seat belt.

name: Sex In Car
definition: Sexual activity, including sexual intercourse or other act performed with another for sexual gratification, in a vehicle.

name: Stolen Car
definition: Motor vehicle theft or grand theft auto is the criminal act of stealing or attempting to steal any motor vehicle, usually an automobile.

name: Suspended License
definition: Administrative License Revocation or ALR is when a driver's license is taken away by law enforcement at the time of the offense or stop by police upon the failure or refusal of a chemical test.

name: Restricted License
definition: Allow the holder to drive for specific purposes. These might include driving to and from work or school, to seek medical treatment or to go to a grocery store.

name: Out of State License
definition: Possesses a Driver's License from another state

name: Tag Light
definition: A light that illuminates license plate/tag

name: Accident
definition: A vehicle, motorcycle, bicycle that strikes or collides another vehicle, a stationary object, a pedestrian, or an animal.

name: Helicopter
definition: An aircraft capable of hover, vertical flight, and horizontal flight in any direction.

name: No Shoes
definition: Not wearing covering for the feet

name: Sticks
definition: Sgt. Sean 'Sticks' Larkin with the Gang Unit of the Tulsa Police Department

name: Don't Film Me
definition: When someone doesn't want to be filmed by the Live PD crew.

name: Not My Car
definition: Someone claims that it's not their car.

name: Not My Drugs
definition: Someone claims that it's not their drugs

name: Ridin' Dirty
definition: Driving with a illegal weapon or drugs. First coined by Houston Rap group U.G.K.(Bun B and Pimp C) In a song 'ridin dirty'

name: Thank You
definition: When someone thanks an officer.

name: Ambulance
definition: A vehicle specially equipped for taking sick or injured people to and from the hospital, especially in emergencies.

name: Blood
definition: The bodily fluid that circulates in the heart, arteries, capillaries, and veins of a vertebrate animal carrying nourishment and oxygen to and bringing away waste products from all parts of the body

name: Fire
definition: Combustion or burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and typically give out bright light, heat, and smoke.

name: No Pants
definition: Someone isn't wearing pants or shorts

name: Bicycle
definition: A vehicle composed of two wheels held in a frame one behind the other, propelled by pedals and steered with handlebars attached to the front wheel.

name: Wild Animal
definition: An animal living in a state of nature; not tamed or domesticated

name: Farm Animal
definition: Any domestic species of cattle, sheep, swine, goats, llamas, or horses

name: Domestic Animal
definition: Any of various animals that have been tamed and made fit for a human environment

name: Kitty Cat
definition: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws. It is widely kept as a pet or for catching mice, and many breeds have been developed.
